mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST(ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_STATS, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_POST.NEXTVAL, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{postStats}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.POST_TITLE, TBP.POST_CONTENT, TBP.POST_READ_COUNT, TBP.POST_STATS, TBP.MEMBER_ID, TBM.MEMBER_EMAIL, TBM.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_POST TBP JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBP.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID

SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.POST_TITLE, TBP.POST_CONTENT, TBP.POST_READ_COUNT, TBP.POST_STATS, TBP.MEMBER_ID, TBM.MEMBER_EMAIL, TBM.MEMBER_NAME FROM TBL_POST TBP JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBP.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID AND TBP.ID = #{id}
